record.field:
% if object.company_id.paypal_account: <form method="post" name="E_FORM" action="${ctx.get('payment_url','')}" target="_blank"> <input type="hidden" name="v_mid" value="${ctx.get('v_mid','')}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_oid" value="${ctx.get('v_oid','')}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_amount" value="${ctx.get('amount','')}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_moneytype" value="${ctx.get('currency','')}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_url" value="${ctx.get('v_url','')}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_md5info" value="${ctx.get('v_md5info','')}">
<!--以下几项项为网上支付完成后，随支付反馈信息一同传给信息接收页 --> <input type="hidden" name="remark1" value="${ctx.get('record','')}"> <input type="hidden" name="remark2" value="${ctx.get('remark2','')}">
<!--以下几项只是用来记录客户信息，可以不用，不影响支付 --> % if ctx.get('model','') == 'sale.order': <!--收货人信息 --> <input type="hidden" name="v_rcvname" value="${object.partner_shipping_id.name or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_rcvtel" value="${object.partner_shipping_id.phone or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_rcvpost" value="${object.partner_shipping_id.zip or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_rcvaddr" value="${object.partner_shipping_id.street or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_rcvemail" value="${object.partner_shipping_id.email or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_rcvmobile" value="${object.partner_shipping_id.mobile or ''}"> % endif <!--订货人信息 --> <input type="hidden" name="v_ordername" value="${object.partner_id.name or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_ordertel" value="${object.partner_id.phone or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_orderpost" value="${object.partner_id.zip or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_orderaddr" value="${object.partner_id.street or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_orderemail" value="${object.partner_id.email or ''}"> <input type="hidden" name="v_ordermobile" value="${object.partner_id.mobile or ''}">
<!--显示支付按钮 --> <input type="image" name="submit" src="https://merchant3.chinabank.com.cn/images/button_1.gif"/> </form> % endif
